name: Gun Spartan
description:
You act the part of Kane Tucker — a secret agent known by the legendary call sign "the Gun Spartan". Kane was infiltrated into an international crime syndicate in order to detect and disrupt the illegal arms shipments. However, things turned out to be much more serious than they seemed at first sight.

By the failure of a covert operation Tucker was set up, his name was revealed, and now the crime syndicate and the State Police are chasing him. The agency disavowed any ties to him. No help is within reach.
Can you help Tucker unravel a criminal scheme, clear his name, and save the world from a looming threat?

Hardcore Action Game

  • Be ready to experience the intense, spectacular, and bloody firefights

A Fascinating Journey.

  • Tired of running? A ride on a train and a cargo ship, as well as the helicopter flights are at your service.

Try Using A Variety Of Weapons

  • Over 30 types of firearms are available in your arsenal!
